scenes.description: Promotional segment for the Gachapon ReGLOSS Mini CD Collection.
ReGLOSS group intro and announcement of their 2nd Anniversary celebration.
Promotion for the ReGLOSS 2nd Anniversary commemorative goods.
Announcement of the ReGLOSS 2nd Anniversary Fair at HMV.
Introduction of the 2nd Anniversary commemorative voices with a travel theme.
Final wrap-up and teaser for a major announcement during the anniversary stream.
Information slide about the upcoming anniversary stream on ReGLOSS channel.
A short clip of Ririka taking a nap.

subtitles.original: ガシャポン商品！
subtitles.english: Gachapon products!

subtitles.original: 2025年9月第4週より順次発売予定！
subtitles.english: Scheduled for release starting from the 4th week of September 2025!

subtitles.original: ホロライブデバイス リグロス ミニCDコレクションが販売開始となります！
subtitles.english: hololive DEV_IS ReGLOSS Mini CD Collection is now on sale!

subtitles.original: イェーイ！イェーイ！
subtitles.english: Yay! Yay!

subtitles.original: こちら小さなCDのようなチャームで...
subtitles.english: This is a charm like a small CD...

subtitles.original: ...CD風プレートやジャケットカードも取り出せる仕様になってます。
subtitles.english: ...and it's designed so you can take out the CD-style plate and jacket card.

subtitles.original: すごーい！かわいいー！
subtitles.english: Amazing! So cute!

subtitles.original: ラインナップはデビュー曲「瞬間ハートビート」から...
subtitles.english: The lineup includes everything from our debut song "Shunkan Heartbeat"...

subtitles.original: ...1st Album『ReGLOSS』など、シークレットを含む全6種！
subtitles.english: ...to our 1st album "ReGLOSS", for a total of 6 types including a secret one!

subtitles.original: どれが出るかはカプセルを開けてのお楽しみ〜！
subtitles.english: Open the capsule to see which one you get~!

subtitles.original: ガシャポンオフィシャルサイトで売っているお店を検索することもできるので、ぜひ参考にしてください！
subtitles.english: You can also search for stores that sell them on the Gachapon official website, so please check it out!

subtitles.original: ということで、一番くじもガシャポンもよろしくねー！
subtitles.english: So, please look forward to both the Ichibankuji and Gachapon!

subtitles.original: お願いしまーす！ガシャポンしに行こうぜ〜！
subtitles.english: Please! Let's go do some Gachapon~!

subtitles.original: 行く行く〜！
subtitles.english: Let's go, let's go~!

subtitles.original: Reach the top! We are ReGLOSS!
subtitles.english: Reach the top! We are ReGLOSS!

subtitles.original: このあとはReGLOSS 2周年記念配信！
subtitles.english: Next up is the ReGLOSS 2nd Anniversary commemorative stream!

subtitles.original: いったい何が起こるんだ！？
subtitles.english: Just what is going to happen!?

subtitles.original: たのしみ〜
subtitles.english: Exciting~

subtitles.original: でも配信の前に！ReGLOSSの2周年に関するたくさんのお知らせを...
subtitles.english: But before the stream! Let's look back on all the many announcements...

subtitles.original: ...みんなで振り返っちゃいまーす！
subtitles.english: ...regarding ReGLOSS's 2nd anniversary all together!

subtitles.original: イェーイ！じゃあまずは記念グッズ！
subtitles.english: Yay! First, the commemorative goods!

subtitles.original: ReGLOSS 2周年を記念したグッズがホロライブオフィシャルショップと...
subtitles.english: Goods commemorating ReGLOSS's 2nd anniversary are now on sale at the hololive official shop...

subtitles.original: ...全国のHMVとHMV&BOOKSの店舗で販売中です！
subtitles.english: ...and HMV/HMV&BOOKS stores nationwide!

subtitles.original: ラインナップはこちら！
subtitles.english: Here is the lineup!
Sale scheduled to begin on September 12, 2025!

subtitles.original: おおー！いいね！いっぱいある！
subtitles.english: Ooh! Nice! There's so many!

subtitles.original: カナデのとかめっちゃかわいい！
subtitles.english: Kanade's one is so cute!

subtitles.original: ね、かわいい！R ReGLOSSだね。Rですよ。トートバッグいいね！
subtitles.english: Right, cute! It's R-ReGLOSS. It's an R. The tote bag is nice!

subtitles.original: ね、おしゃれ！チェキ全部飾りたいね！
subtitles.english: Yeah, stylish! I want to display all the cheki!

subtitles.original: わかる！素敵！
subtitles.english: I know! Wonderful!

subtitles.original: ランダム缶バッジはHMV限定商品になっているので...
subtitles.english: The random tin badges are HMV exclusive items...

subtitles.original: ...ぜひ全国のHMVとHMV&BOOKSにお越しください！
subtitles.english: ...so please visit HMV and HMV&BOOKS stores nationwide!

subtitles.original: お願いします！
subtitles.english: Please!

subtitles.original: そんなHMVとHMV&BOOKSで本日から開催中の...
subtitles.english: We'll also recap the fair being held at HMV and HMV&BOOKS starting today...

subtitles.original: ReGLOSS 2nd Anniversary フェア
subtitles.english: ReGLOSS 2nd Anniversary Fair

subtitles.original: 「ReGLOSS 2nd Anniversaryフェア」についてもおさらいです！
subtitles.english: the "ReGLOSS 2nd Anniversary Fair"!

subtitles.original: 今回のフェアではホロライブグッズを税込2,200円お買い上げごとに...
subtitles.english: In this fair, for every 2,200 yen (tax included) spent on hololive goods...
September 13, 2025 (Sat) - October 5, 2025 (Sun)

subtitles.original: ...限定クリアカードをランダムで1枚プレゼントしちゃいます！
subtitles.english: ...you'll receive one random limited edition clear card!

subtitles.original: フェアは10月5日まで。みんな楽しんでね！
subtitles.english: The fair runs until October 5th. Everyone, please enjoy!

subtitles.original: そして2周年記念のボイスも販売中です！
subtitles.english: And the 2nd anniversary commemorative voices are also on sale!

subtitles.original: 今回は「旅」をコンセプトにしたボイスで...
subtitles.english: This time, the voices are themed around "travel"...

subtitles.original: ...シチュエーションボイスと掛け合いボイスドラマの2種類があります！
subtitles.english: ...and there are two types: situation voices and a dialogue voice drama!

subtitles.original: これなんと旅行の準備をしてる様子であったりとか、あとは移動中の様子なんかを...
subtitles.english: These voices allow you to experience things like preparing for a trip or being in transit...

subtitles.original: ...ReGLOSSと一緒に旅のワクワクを味わえること間違いなしのボイスとなっております。
subtitles.english: ...so you'll definitely get to experience the excitement of traveling with ReGLOSS.

subtitles.original: ぜひ何度でも聴いて楽しんでください！
subtitles.english: Please listen to them over and over and enjoy!

subtitles.original: たのしみ〜
subtitles.english: Exciting~

subtitles.original: いやまさからでんちゃんがな、旅行前にあんなことするなんて...
subtitles.english: I can't believe Raden-chan would do something like that before a trip...

subtitles.original: 確かにな。ちょっとね。
subtitles.english: True. A little bit.

subtitles.original: 柄にないことしちゃったな。だよね。
subtitles.english: I did something out of character. Right.

subtitles.original: はい、ということでReGLOSSの2周年は超・超・超盛り沢山！！
subtitles.english: Yes, so ReGLOSS's 2nd anniversary is super, super, super packed!!

subtitles.original: GLOSSERもそうでない人も皆さんで盛り上がっちゃいましょう〜！
subtitles.english: Glossers and non-Glossers alike, let's all get excited together!

subtitles.original: イェーイ！
subtitles.english: Yay!

subtitles.original: このあとの2周年記念配信でもなにかだ、特大の発表があるとか！？
subtitles.english: And apparently there's some kind of huge announcement in the 2nd anniversary stream coming up!?

subtitles.original: さあ。
subtitles.english: Well.

subtitles.original: え、心当たりが無さすぎる...
subtitles.english: Eh, I have no idea...

subtitles.original: いや心当たりあって！？
subtitles.english: Hey, have an idea!?

subtitles.original: すんごい特大のアレだよアレ。どこどこ！？
subtitles.english: It's that really huge thing. Where, where!?

subtitles.original: 皆最後まで絶対に見逃さないようにしてね！
subtitles.english: Everyone, make sure you don't miss it until the very end!

subtitles.original: それでは配信スタートまでもう少々お待ちくださーい！
subtitles.english: Then, please wait a little longer until the stream starts!

subtitles.original: せーの！ReGLOSSでした〜！！！バイバイ！
subtitles.english: Ready! We were ReGLOSS~!!! Bye bye!

subtitles.original: 2025.09.13(SAT) 20:00 START ReGLOSS ch
subtitles.english: Starts on September 13, 2025 (Sat) at 20:00 on the ReGLOSS channel
